flow.descriptionCdata:
36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.0897b4d0-09ff-4323-864c-cc3e41f5dcb7.transition.description=average saved in global context 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.0ac8a605-4763-4998-959c-5a7c2d5c0c94.description=checks how much time has elapsed, determining whether or not the averager should continue to loop. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.17032144-206a-499e-a2aa-adf28c4d3966.transition.description=wait completed, go get next value. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.31912808-c274-4b48-b296-694a2bf88f91.description=Saves average to global context. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.35951a22-58df-4457-b65b-a739d8732a74.transition.description=start time cleared from global context 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.407dfd15-b3a2-457f-a9eb-42f157f64eab.transition.description=Value added to list. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.4d35e88c-4fef-48d9-a485-625dbfb3c7cd.description=Performs a statistical operation on the given list. Inputs\: list - The list to iterate through. delimiter - A delimiter that separates elements in the list. Returns\: The current element of the list, if the response is has more Responses\: success - the operation completed successfully. failure - failed to process the list or something went wrong. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.5a04c4a1-670d-4b6d-8cce-a76e60671989.transition.description=The specified amount of time has elapsed. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.5d7c984d-c79d-480a-b638-c18b1eb81fdf.description=list cleared from global context 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.7d49b844-77bc-4b31-a081-210b1978cb6c.description=Performs a mathmatical operation on two numbers Inputs\: operation - The operation to perform. value1 - the first value. value2 - the second value. Returns\: The result of the operation, for boolean values this is true or false. Responses\: success - The operation completed successfully. If a boolean operation, it evaluated to true. failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.7eeac6c4-57c7-4871-a288-ab2293f9b5a0.description=saves the updated list in the global context. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.8cd4efe7-747f-4237-a907-dc5b70781f1c.transition.description=average equalled threshold. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.b95770aa-ff3b-4e23-bed9-b54f644b0dd7.description=start time cleared from global context. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.bc4ab9ae-098a-4d4b-869d-a2550b63fea4.transition.description=The specified amount of time has not yet elapsed, continue looping. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.be6893dc-d6f8-4181-8ae6-28a5c3126323.transition.description=List saved to global context 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.d9a47a24-4254-460d-8752-8652bf0bdf50.transition.description=List cleared from global context. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.dad1b13d-625a-4003-a8ca-ac2ad9916eb8.transition.description=average was below threshold. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.dc005542-bd94-491a-ba58-70dbf8a49c15.transition.description=average was greater than threshold. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.description=Loops over a specified amount of time and averages a value fed into it over this time. Checks to see if this value is above or below a specified threshold. This flow should only be used as a subflow since using it on its own will always return the continue response unless runLength is assigned a value of 0. When this flow gives the continue response the calling flow must obtain another value, and pass it to this flow again. inputs\: runLength - the number of seconds this flow should loop. waitTime - the number of seconds this flow should before returning when looping. threshold - A value to compare the averaged value to. VALUE - the value of the most recent function call, which will be added to the average. keyName - the key that the list of values will be stored in until averaging. responses\: less than - The average was less than the threshold. equal - the average was the same as the threshold. greater than - the average was greater than the threshold. Continue - the specified amount of time has not yet passed, the calling flow should run another operation and pass this flow another value. failure - values in keyName could not be averaged. additional results\: average - the average value of the list. only a result is the response is success. List - a list that is accumulating values. This is erased when the time runs out. timeStarted - the time since you made the first function call. this is erased when time runs out. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.ea5b4c5d-3437-4ce7-94e4-c8522b8a04d7.description=Adds the newest value to the list of values. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.ec8dd2be-05f1-4e94-864e-303be6d891cc.description=Performs a mathmatical operation on two numbers Inputs\: operation - The operation to perform. value1 - the first value. value2 - the second value. Returns\: The result of the operation, for boolean values this is true or false. Responses\: success - The operation completed successfully. If a boolean operation, it evaluated to true. failure - Something went wrong or the boolean operation returned false. 36d34804-c6db-4dd3-8885-945380536f6c.ec9f3baa-1ee3-4b8a-bac2-9871e8775bcc.description=
Sleeps the flow for the specified amount of seconds.

Input Parameters\:
seconds - the number of seconds to sleep

Responses\:
success - the number of seconds has elapsed
flow.name: Average Threshold
